UV Layers
Retrieving the UV Unwrap Result
Reading UV Layer Data
 
Integrating the Beast API > Creating UVs for Meshes > Retrieving the UV Unwrap Result > 

Retrieving UV Layers

 
 
 

The following API functions aer used to retrieve UV layers:

  • ILBGetUVLayerFromTarget() returns a handle to the UV layer given a target and a target entity.
  • ILBGetUVLayerResolutionFromTarget() returns the resulting resolution for the packed UV layout. Using this resolution when baking textures for the mesh ensures the padding between the UV charts is large enough. When creating the UV unwrap target, texelsPerWorldUnit affects how large the resolution becomes, and how much padding is used between charts.
